name: Dragon Egg
uniques: Guaranteed with Strategic Balance resource option

civilopediaText.text: Large oval bounders, commonly believed to be eggs of an ancient dragon race. No one knows a way to hatch them though, all it does is increase peoples beliefs in myths and fantasies.
